description: Shadow Hunter character definitions - Base game + Expansion

ability.name: Blessed
ability.description: When you attack, you may choose to add 1 to your attack damage.

ability.name: Leadership
ability.description: Once per game after moving, you may pick any one player and move them to your Area.

ability.name: Demolition
ability.description: You can use the Demolition ability: pick a player in the same Area and give 3 damage, but receive 2 damage yourself.

ability.name: Copy
ability.description: When revealed, you may copy another revealed player's ability.

ability.name: Bloodthirst
ability.description: Once per game, at the start of your turn, you may give 1 damage to any player and heal 1 damage.

ability.name: Unearthly Speed
ability.description: After attacking, if you killed a Hunter or Neutral, heal 2 damage.

allie.name: Allie
allie.win_condition: Kill another player or be killed by another player.

ability.name: Lover
ability.description: Win by killing or being killed by another player.

bob.name: Bob
bob.win_condition: If no Neutral wins, you must be alive when the game ends.

ability.name: Survivalist
ability.description: Win by surviving to the end if no other Neutral wins.

charles.name: Charles
charles.win_condition: At the time you kill another character, the total number of dead characters is 3 or more.

ability.name: Reaper
ability.description: Win by killing a character when 3+ total characters are dead.

daniel.name: Daniel
daniel.win_condition: You must be the first player to kill, or be killed.

ability.name: Stalker
ability.description: Win by being the first to kill or be killed.

ability.name: Chain of Forbidden Curse
ability.description: Once per game, permanently disable an opponent's special ability.

ability.name: Dynamite Nurse
ability.description: Once per game, set any character's damage to exactly 7 points.

ability.name: Ghostly Barrier
ability.description: Once per game at turn end, prevent all damage until your next turn.

ability.name: Murder Ray
ability.description: At turn start, inflict 3 damage to characters at the Underworld Gate.

ability.name: Horn of War Outbreak
ability.description: Use only a 4-sided die for attack damage instead of the standard die.

ability.name: Multiplication
ability.description: Once per game at turn end, gain extra turns equal to current dead character count.

agnes.name: Agnes
agnes.win_condition: When the game is over, if the player to your immediate right wins, you also win.

ability.name: Capriccio
ability.description: Once per game at turn start, change win condition to favor the player on your left instead.

bryan.name: Bryan
bryan.win_condition: Eliminate a character with 13+ HP through direct attack, or be on the Erstwhile Altar when game ends.

ability.name: My GOD!!!
ability.description: Must reveal identity when killing characters with 12 or fewer health points via attack.

catherine.name: Catherine
catherine.win_condition: Die first, or be one of the last two characters standing.

ability.name: Stigmata
ability.description: Each turn start, heal 1 damage point if applicable.

david.name: David
david.win_condition: Equip three or more specific White cards simultaneously: Spear of Longinus, Holy Robe, Silver Rosary, or Talisman.

ability.name: Grave Digger
ability.description: Once per game, obtain any equipment card from discard piles, even outside your turn.
